name: miniPhagocytosis
description:
Take on the role of a white blood cell escorting red blood cells though an infected vessel. Collect bacteria to level up and gain power! Made for the ScoreSpace game jam!

Controls:

WASD: Move white blood cells and navigate menu.

Space: Shoot white blood cells and accept menu choice.

and thats it!

KNOWN BUGS:  

There seems to be an issue with pausing the game while leveling up. Sometimes a red blood cell disappears, which is game breaking D:

White blood cells are also known to blow up after leveling up, but the player usually has some cells left.

Follow me @ZacharyBuffone to recieve updates on current and future projects!
